proposal: Understanding the essence of BAL Gauges and your commitment to fostering a robust ecosystem, it's clear you're all about empowering the community and enhancing governance. With 12 holders in the ETH network, congrats on building a tight-knit community! Our toolkit, from DEX creation to DAO governance, aligns perfectly with your vision, enabling anyone in your community to deploy revenue-sharing tools like lotteries and DEXes. Let's make governance not just a duty, but a rewarding journey.
